AGREEMENT_DESCRIPTION1: This User Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the Agreement) regulates the relationship between LLC 'SPORTYFINDER' (hereinafter referred to as Sportyfinder or Administration) on one side and the user of the website on the other. The Sportyfinder website is not a mass media outlet.
AGREEMENT_DESCRIPTION2: By using the website, you agree to the terms of this Agreement.
AGREEMENT_DESCRIPTION-BOLD: If you do not agree with the terms of this Agreement, do not use the Sportyfinder website!

AGREEMENT_DATA.heading: Rights and Obligations of the Parties
pointedWithDashed: The User has the right to:
Search for information on the website
Access information on the website
Create information for the website
Distribute information on the website
Comment on content posted on the website
Request the administration to hide any information about the user
Use the information on the website for personal non-commercial purposes
Use the information on the website for commercial purposes with the Administration's permission
Use the information on the website for commercial purposes with the permission of the rights holders
Use the information on the website for commercial purposes without special permission
The Administration has the right to:
Create, change, or cancel rules at its discretion and as necessary
Limit access to any information on the website
Create, modify, or delete information
Delete user accounts
Refuse registration without explanation
The User undertakes to:
Ensure the accuracy of the information provided
Ensure the security of personal data from third-party access
Update personal data provided during registration if changes occur
Not disrupt the functionality of the website
Not use scripts (programs) for automated data collection and/or interaction with the Website and its Services
The Administration undertakes to:
Maintain the functionality of the website, except in cases where it is impossible due to reasons beyond the Administration's control.

AGREEMENT_DATA.heading: Liability of the Parties
pointedList: The user is personally fully responsible for the information they distribute
The administration is not responsible for the accuracy of information copied from other sources
The administration is not responsible for the discrepancy between the services expected by the user and the services actually provided
The administration is not responsible for services provided by third parties

In the event of a force majeure situation (such as military actions, a state of emergency, natural disasters, etc.), the administration does not guarantee the preservation of information posted by the user or the uninterrupted operation of the information resource.

AGREEMENT_DATA.heading: Terms of Agreement
AGREEMENT_DATA.description: This Agreement comes into effect upon any use of this website. The Agreement ceases to be valid upon the release of a new version. The administration reserves the right to unilaterally modify this Agreement at its discretion. The administration is not required to notify users about changes to the Agreement.
